text: George Ian Kenneth "Kenny" Ireland (7 August 1945 â€“ 31 July 2014) was a Scottish actor and theatre director. He was best known to television viewers as part of Victoria Wood's "rep company" in the BBC series Victoria Wood As Seen On TV. He played Donald in Benidorm from 2007 until 2014. Ireland died on 31 July 2014 from brain cancer, aged 68. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1945 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Actors from Paisley, Renfrewshire Category:Scottish movie actors Category:Scottish television actors Category:Scottish theatre directors
title: Kenny Ireland
